2.rawvalue:
This webpage is just a **view** of a spreadsheet page.

You create a tiny website by building a set of spreadsheets and then *wrapping* them in web page views.

There is ***no*** programming involved.

Click [here](./?view=_g/core/spreadsheet) to see the spreadsheet behind this page.
